Acetylsalicylic acid.description: Acetylsalicylic acid, commonly known as aspirin, is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to relieve pain, reduce inflammation, and lower fever. It also has antiplatelet properties, making it useful in preventing blood clots.
